fi.lrkr.pathfinder.pathfinder

Class Pathfinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.lrkr.pathfinder.pathfinder.Pathfinder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AStar, BreadthFirst

    public abstract class Pathfinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for Pathfinding algorithms. Provides useful methods that are needed for different Pathfinder implementations.

      protected Result result

      Checks if the current location is the Maze's end location.

      After Pathfinder has reached the end this method backtracks to the start to create the route.

      Creates a list of valid Locations adjacent to a Location.

      Abstract method for solving the Maze.

        public Pathfinder(Maze maze)

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public abstract Result solve()
        Abstract method for solving the Maze. Each implementation uses its own solve method.
        Returns:
        Result object containing the route and steps takens

      • createPath

        protected void createPath(Vertex l)
        After Pathfinder has reached the end this method backtracks to the start to create the route.
        Parameters:
        l - Pathfinder's last Vertex which is the Maze's end Location if Pathfinder was successful.

      • checkWin

        protected boolean checkWin(Location l)
        Checks if the current location is the Maze's end location.
        Parameters:
        l - Location to be checked
        Returns:
        Boolean value signifying if the pathfinder is at the end or not

      • getAdjacent

        protected List<Location> getAdjacent(Location l)
        Creates a list of valid Locations adjacent to a Location.
        Parameters:
        l - Location from which adjacents are checked
        Returns:
        List of valid adjacent Locations
